means: 用钱，花钱( spend的过去式和过去分词 )

you spent three months living there ., 你花了三个月的时间住在那儿.
Can you account for all the money you spent on your trip ?, 你能说明一下你在旅行时所用的钱都怎么花的吗?

entry.def: Spent is the past tense and past participle of spend .
Spent substances or containers have been used and cannot be used again.

example.ex: Radioactive waste is simply spent fuel...
example.tran: 放射性废物就是用后的燃料。

example.ex: Several spent cartridges have already been found.
example.tran: 几个空弹壳已经被找到。

means.word_mean: 1. drained of energy or effectiveness; extremely tired; completely exhausted;

sentences.sentence: "the trembling of his played out limbs"

auth_sentence.content: My father spent his whole life at this plant.
auth_sentence.res_content: My father spent his whole life at this plant.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: My father spent his whole life at this plant.

auth_sentence.content: Money could be better spent on hospitals or schools.
auth_sentence.res_content: Money could be better spent on hospitals or schools.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: Money could be better spent on hospitals or schools.

auth_sentence.content: He has spent most of his life in politics.
auth_sentence.res_content: He has spent most of his life in politics.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: He has spent most of his life in politics.

Sentence.sentence: Once she lost a two-cent stamp and spent the night looking for it.
Worst of all, when her son, Ned, fell and injured his knee, she refused to pay for a doctor and spent hours looking for free medical help
Kodak is an example of a firm that was very much aware that they had to adapt, and spent a lot of money trying to do so, but ultimately failed.
in one study, people who were instructed to think about money before entering a cafe spent less times chatting with the other patrons and more time working.
He spent most of his days outdoors and had deep love for the wild lands.
The interracial roommates spent less time together, and had fewer joint activities than the white pairs.

means.word_mean: 用过的;不再有用的; 已废的; 失效的

sentences.cn: 她发现了两根用过的火柴。

means.word_mean: 权力不再的人(或集团)；不再有影响力的人(或集团)

sentences.en: The new album is proof that this band is not a spent force just yet.
sentences.cn: 新专辑证明这支乐队风头仍健。
